subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: When the Islanders play their first regular-season game at Barclays Center on Oct. 9, fans will find some hallmarks from the team’s time on Long Island and features that highlight its new home.
snippet: When the Islanders play their first regular-season game at Barclays Center on Oct. 9, fans will find some hallmarks from the team’s time on Long Island and features that highlight its new home.
